D

Data - package Data
 
DatabaseHandler - Class in Handler
Handles storing Database information and the creation of new database connections
DatabaseHandler() - Constructor for class Handler.DatabaseHandler
 
decrypt(String) - Static method in class Handler.EncryptionHandler
Class used to decrypt an encrypted string that is in the database
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Servlet.MailDispatcherServlet
This method is used to retrieve information from the servers
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Servlet.BidServlet
This method is used to get the values from the session and these values are passed on to the createNewBid method of BidHandler class.
doPost(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Servlet.LoginServlet
doPost called when the form is submitted, validates the form data and decides on next action
DutchAuction - Class in Data
 
DutchAuction(ResultSet) - Constructor for class Data.DutchAuction
 
DutchAuctionServlet - Class in Servlet
DutchAuction Servlet, handles the backend logic for DutchAuction URL
